long_description: The Born Danila boots combine comfortable, durable support with rich leather uppers and shearling linings so when cold weather comes around, your feet will feel great and look even better. Leather uppers offer flexible, durable support and structure; decorative, nonfunctional side zippers add style. Shearling linings provide breathable warmth. EVA insoles deliver cushioning; steel shanks add excellent support for long days of standing or walking. Born Danila boots feature 2 in. heels; rubber outsoles provide reliable traction. Closeout.
short_description: The Born Danila boots combine comfortable, durable support with rich leather uppers and shearling linings so when cold weather comes around, your feet will feel great and look even better.
